Rhinox/Sniper/Scorponok


Rhinox Steps out of the cr chamber. He has his Chaingun back. Rhinox 
starts to head outside when the Energon storm hits the base. "What
the 
Slag? Computer, whats happening?"

Computer:Energon storm.

Rhinox runs outside. He looks for anybots to fire upon. He goes on
his 
com. "Any Maximal need Help?"



Sniper sees the energon storm coming. "Who made that?" Just then he 
sees Defecticon(sorry if I misspelled it) on a hill. He aims his
scope 
at Defecticon Right Leg. He fires 7 Shots as the energon storm hits. 
He dives in a ditch, not getting hit.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`
Scorponok waits in the room, wating for Darkmouse to leave.
"Megatron, 
I must tell you something, in private." Scorponok glares over at 
Darkmouse.
